message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it.
I'm interested in the product, but $180 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $120?
I understand that $180 is a bit steep, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we compromise at $160?
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit hesitant. Would you be willing to go down to $140?
I'm still a bit hesitant to go all the way down to $140, but I'm willing to meet you halfway again. How about we compromise at $152?
I'm getting close, but I still think we can do better. Would you be willing to go down to $145?
I'm getting a bit tired of going back and forth, but I'm willing to make one more compromise. How about we meet in the middle at $148?
I appreciate the willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to go down to $142?
